title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
Introducing the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover! This innovative and versatile playpen is perfect for your furry friends, whether they are dogs, chickens, rabbits, or ducks. With its user-friendly features and durable construction, it's the ideal choice for elderly folks who want to keep their pets safe and secure.

The playpen has a spacious design, measuring 4.2 feet wide, 4.0 feet long, and 4.4 feet tall. It's suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, allowing your pets to enjoy fresh air and sunshine while staying protected. Made from galvanized metal iron with a paint-coated finish, this playpen is rust-resistant and has no sharp edges, ensuring the utmost safety for your pets.

To protect your pets from the elements, the playpen comes with a high-quality cover made of 210D oxford cloth. The cover is windproof, weatherproof, and provides a sunshade, ensuring your pets stay comfortable in any weather condition.

Safety is a top priority, which is why the playpen features a solid latching swing gate with strong latches. This gate provides easy access for you while keeping your pets securely inside.

The playpen also offers excellent ventilation, allowing fresh air to circulate and keeping your pets cool and comfortable. It's available in two sizes, small and large, to accommodate different pet breeds and sizes.

Installation is a breeze with easy-to-install panels, making it convenient even for elderly folks. Simply follow the instructions, and your playpen will be ready in no time.

Give your pets the freedom to play and roam safely with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover. Order yours today and provide a secure and comfortable environment for your beloved pets.
